name: Dream Hunted
description:
This is my first Jam and my first game, Thank you for giving feedback!

VimJam game Submission,

Dreams come in many forms, Scary, strange, funny and etc.

If this was your dream, what would you do?

Created by Markus Persson,

Controls

  • WASD to control the character
  • Space to use altars

All assests created by Markus Persson
